currencies.name: Etherium Coin
currencies.description: The currency across the shattered kingdoms
currencies.lore: Etherium coins, shimmering metallic discs infused with ethereal energy, the currency of choice in the shattered realms.

currencies.name: Celestial Token
currencies.description: Used to collect additional rewards after raids or boss fights
currencies.lore: These mystical tokens hold the essence of the celestial realms, granting access to premium rewards raids and boss encounters.

currencies.name: Scroll of Wisdom
currencies.lore: An illustrious scroll scribed with the profound insights of the ages, elevating the reader's understanding to new heights

currencies.name: Tome of Enlightment
currencies.lore: A humble tome filled with ancient teachings, granting a modest boon of knowledge to those who study its contents

currencies.name: Codex of Ascendancy
currencies.lore: A refined codex teeming with esoteric knowledge, providing a substantial source of wisdom for the eager seeker

currencies.name: Grimoire of Omniscience
currencies.lore: An unparalleled grimoire emanating with boundless wisdom and arcane revelations, unlocking the full potential of those who delve into its secrets.

currencies.name: Infusion Orb
currencies.lore: A shimmering orb containing a faint glimmer of ancient knowledge, granting gentle nourishment to items seeking growth

currencies.name: Infusion Shard
currencies.lore: A radiant crystal resonating with magical energies, bestowing substantial strength to those who seek to enhance their artifacts

currencies.name: Infusion Crystal
currencies.lore: A crystalline shard pulsating with immense power, capable of unlocking the full potential of even the most legendary items

currencies.name: Ascendant Essence
currencies.lore: An ethereal essence that transcends the boundaries of time and space, empowering items with unparalleled might, reserved for only the most legendary crafts
